Package board

Class Knight

java.lang.Object
board.ChessPiece
board.Knight
public class Knight extends ChessPiece
This class implements a Knight, chess piece that can only move 2 spaces in one direction and 1 space that is perpendicular to the aforementioned direction
Version:
1
Author:
Evan Liu

  • Constructor Details

    • Knight

      public Knight​(boolean white, String name)
      creates a Knight, a chess piece that can only move 2 spaces in one direction and 1 space that is perpendicular to the aforementioned direction
      Parameters:
      white - whether it's a white piece or a black piece
      name - output string that will be shown in the ascii art

  • Method Details

    • isValidMove

      public static boolean isValidMove​(int initial_col, int initial_row, int end_col, int end_row, ChessPiece[][] board, ChessPiece o)
      This is a boolean method to check if the Knight can be moved from its initial spot to the end spot that we're trying to get to.
      Parameters:
      initial_col - initial column that the Knight resides in
      initial_row - initial row that the Knight resides in
      end_col - column that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      end_row - row that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      board - the 2D array of Chess pieces that contains the Knight
      o - the actual King object in the 2D array
      Returns:
      whether or not the move from [initial_row][initial_col] to [end_row][end_col] can be executed

    • Check

      public static boolean Check​(int row, int col, ChessPiece[][] board, ChessPiece o)
      determines if the specific space in [row][col] is being under attack by a knight
      Parameters:
      row - row the ChessPiece o is attacking
      col - col the ChessPiece o is attacking
      board - 2D array of chessPieces
      o - the object that is attacking [row][col]
      Returns:
      whether or not the specific space is being attacked by a knight
